title: I want the app icons on my homescreen to be larger. The were when I first started my phone.
content: The icons on my home screen for the apps are very small. they go frive across the screen on my pixel for. I would like to make them larger so it's only for across the screen. I tried under settings and display and although I can make my text larger I cannot make the icons larger. Is there anything I'm doing wrong? When my phone first started they were larger. Something I did made them smaller and I can't get out of it. Thanks for any help.
